titleStmt.title: S. P. Love to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2220

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
South Carrollton Muhlenberg Co
October 30th 1865
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov Ky
My Dear Sir

At the Request of the citizens of this place I write you to petition that you appoint me "Notary Public" at this place for the County of Muhlenberg, the office is very Much needed here we live 10 miles from the County seat and are at times put to great inconvenience for the want of an officer to administer oaths an Early compliance is requested

Yrs Respectfully
S. P. Love
Late Col 11th Ky Inf

Notary Public
Muhlenburg Co
S. P. Love
apptd
4th Nov 1865
